Package uber

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer  
    Subject
    Subject interface to serve as a counterpart to Observer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Customer
    Customer class to represent a User that can make a Request for a service from Uber.
    Driver
    Uber Driver class, which inherits from User.
    Location  
    Meter
    The system that keeps track of the rate and the fare for a Uber request.
    Rating  
    Request
    Represents a request (for a ride, for example), to send to Uber.
    RequestHandler
    Handles Uber requests; is responsible for choosing an appropriate driver for the User who sent the Request.
    RouteTimer
    A Timer class that serves as an Observer to RequestHandler.
    Uber
    The Uber system.
    UberHelper
    Helper class, containing static functions, to aid in the general tasks that Uber must perform, such as parsing.
    UberSimulator
    Simulator (main) for the Uber program.
    User
    A person that uses Uber.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AccountType  
    Delivery  
    Status  
    UserProperty
